Subjects: sermons, verse in; instruction, religious; love, divine and human
_description: Instructions in the four ways that man must love, in a Latin sermon — two couplets

CamCCC423.Transcription:
deus a boue all thyng 2o
noscit ipsos without synyng3o
proximum sicut nature the techeth4o
Inimicum with out any wreth
CamCCC423.Note:
In 13 Sermones (beg. p. 159), the sermon on
                    ‘Diligit’ (p. 243).
